name: JDBC Operations Must Be Transactional
description: You are enforcing transaction boundaries for database writes. A violation occurs if a method performs database modifications (insert, update, delete) using JDBC or JPA but is NOT running within a @Transactional context. This risks data inconsistency if the operation fails halfway.

remediation.quickFix: Annotate the method or its class with @Transactional
remediation.explanation: Database modifications performed without a transaction can lead to partial updates and corrupted data states if an error occurs. Always wrap related DB operations in a transaction.
